headline: Functional Foods Market Surges to USD 654.45 Billion by 2033, Propelled by 10.4% CAGR - Verified Market Reports速
summary: The Global Functional Foods Market is projected to grow at a CAGR of 10.4% from 2026 to 2033, according to a new report published by Verified Market Reports速. The report reveals that the market was valued at USD 274.78 Billion in 2024 and is expected to reach USD 654.45 Billion by the end of the forecast period.
